name: Explosive fly (surbhishukla38@gmail.com)
description:
Title : Explosive Fly   (Jump Gone Wrong)

Game genre :             2d /casual game

Game theme :            fairy and Dragons 

- GamePlay consist of shooting dragons (by colliding them with fairy) in order to burst the dragon 

shells  , which makes dragons fall and get killed, for each dragon killed single score is gained.

- Obstacles : fireballs are instantiated from which the fairy is needed to be protected. , if it 

collides with it then one Life is loosed.    ( 3 Lives are provided) .

- power Ups   is provided once in a gameplay.
- game begins with a basic story line and how to play tutorial.

* MOVES AND CONTROLS  

 - Jump Based _Single Button /Tap & long press.

Assets used : https://opengameart.org
Sounds Used : https://freesound.org
UI/UX sprites : https://pngtree.com/free-graphic-design

By - surbhi shukla
DiscordUsername :surbhi38 #0752
